game.title: Goblin Slaying
game.description: The local village is being terrorized by a group of goblins. The mayor has asked you to help them by clearing out the goblins from the forest.
game.reward: 100 gold pieces and a goblin horn.

task.objective: Find the goblin cave in the forest.
task.description: The goblins are hiding in a cave in the forest. You need to find the cave and defeat them.
The goblin leader is a powerful warrior. You need to be careful when fighting him.
Once you have defeated the goblins, you need to report back to the mayor to collect your reward.
